page.title: 04Grantham:Industry
page.content: The major factory in Grantham is Aveling Barford. This firm was established in Grantham in the 1930s to manufacture road rollers.The firm prospered during the Second World War making gun carriers.Since the War the factory has made road rollers, graders and large earth moving dumper trucks,many for export. After a period under public ownership with British Leyland the Factory is again privately owned under American management.Aveling Barford is the largest employer in the town and at the moment is one of the major producers of earth excavating machinery in the country.
